alert.note: Alert for Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine; Fergus County below 4500ft; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap; Northern Blaine County; Snowy and Judith Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued February 03 at 2:17AM MST until February 04 at 5:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Snowy and Judith Mountains, Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine, Fergus County below 4500ft, Judith Basin County and Judith Gap and Northern Blaine County. * WHEN...From late tonight through Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates.

area.areaDesc: Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine; Fergus County below 4500ft; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap; Northern Blaine County; Snowy and Judith Mountains
